website_summaries.verdict: This pool is the perfect size for preschoolers and their parents, and it comes at a brilliant price.
pros: Smaller size works well in limited spaces
Convenient drain plug connects to garden hose
cons: Consider laying a tarp or protective barrier beneath the pool to help protect it from rocks, sticks, and other sharp objects that could tear it

customer_reviews.title: Best 100$ purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best 100$ purchase ever. Great small pool to cool off in the hot summer. Got the cover and pump. Throw a few chlorine tabs in a floater and you are good to go on those really hot days.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Myers

customer_reviews.title: My 2/4/5 year old grandkids have enjoyed it. I have only had to put a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd one after about 4 years. The 1st I had with a filter which didn’t last long and this is the only reason I gave it a 4. This pool really works well if you use a chlorine tablet float and keep a cover over the pool when not in use (very important). My 2/4/5 year old grandkids have enjoyed it. I have only had to put a few patches on it but that’s been very easy and only because my dog has jumped on the sides 🙁. Well worth the money on level ground!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Gunter

customer_reviews.title: WORD TO THE WISE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pool in anticipation of some summer fun for grand kids. Unfortunately, before I had the chance to use it my window of exchange expired. When we set the pool up the inflatable ring woold not hold air rendering the pool useless. It is a chore to take down and store but I encourage anyone that purchases it to set it up to make sure it’s not defective.
customer_reviews.author: james d randolph

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Too flimsy. The inflatable part became flat over night and created a huge mess in my back yard.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Darr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 3 yr old daughter easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my 3 yr old daughter easy to install but confused about the pump also for perspective buyers make sure you have a air pump and buy the filter pump bc we bought later and now have to drain to install. Hassle.
customer_reviews.author: ashley amaya

customer_reviews.title: defective from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Pool showed up with a split in the seam where the base meets the side. I have had 3 of these pools, it lasts all summer but doesn't store well. This is he only one that has shown up with issues
customer_reviews.author: S.N.

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy from Intex and My Quick Buy
customer_reviews.text: The pool leaked from the very first filling. I called Intex, waited on with the automated message for 60 minutes until I gave up. The automated message indicated that pools have no warranty and are only covered by a courtesy 90 day service program, which can only be used if someone at Intex answers the phone and gives a claim number. I then reached out to My Quick Buy who told me to call Intex and that the pool was covered by a warranty. Do no buy from My Quick Buy and do not buy Intex pools!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Geppner

customer_reviews.title: Filter and cover are a must
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased but only because we purchased the cover and filter as well. Would not recommend without these additions. Nice that you don’t have to inflate the entire pool, but it makes the walls slope unevenly when the top (white part - inflatable) is not full. Make sure you measure. Picture does not accurately reflect size. Kids are 8 and 5. They love it but splash and play only. No room for “swimming.” Good luck buying it this year. Price has tripled since we bought this. Purchased it early May and received 6 weeks later due to Covid.
customer_reviews.author: MKP

customer_reviews.title: Hours and hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was hesitant to get this but I insisted that we needed it, and boy was I right! We set it up last night and today my two girls (9&5) played in it ALL day! They just had so much fun! We plan on taking them to a bigger community pool for family pool days, but thought that this would be great on the days that we all didn't want to head out. Pretty easy to set up and hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage
customer_reviews.text: It must be on a perfectly flat surface. Even a small dip or slope will cause you problems. That isn’t the reason for my review though. It popped at least one hole after light use. It came with no patch kit (popped on the inflatable part) and after purchasing and trying to patch it, it still wouldn’t hold air. I had committed to the upgraded filter as well so I’m ultimately out a fair chunk of money for an unwieldy pile of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Itsme

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I followed all the directions perfectly. This pool didn’t last a Day. I laid in it alone for couple hours. Come back out and it’s deflated and the water is out. Very disappointed as this was a birthday present from my mom. Now she is out money and I don’t have a pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sides blob out quickly/add air and water looking good today
customer_reviews.text: Is as all the reviews say. It looses its shape in one week. The top air ring deflated daily and lost its air in a week. I’m using it for low impact exercise so it’s fine for me. By don’t get for multiperson swimming Update: air is going out of ring daily. Sides are blobbing out more each day. I wish I would have only had to pay $70 for this. It’s not worth $140. But for me it’s still good for my low impact exercise and cooling down as summer starts to come in. Update: 5-29-20 It looks good today. Air fill up and water fill up and it’s ready for some exercise and cooling down swimming today.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Dufour

customer_reviews.title: Great Pool. 10x30
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for us. We got the 10x30. I’ll let you all know though. Before Quarentine these are $70 on the Intex site. We over paid but times are tough and the extra was worth it these days. I hate price gougers though!!
customer_reviews.author: Duane C.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy from them!
customer_reviews.text: Finally put up the pool and there’s a leak on the seam on the bottom that has a odd orange piece of tape where it’s leaking. I’m so bummed. The leak is big enough that I can’t even use the pool. Update! Don’t buy from them. They sent me a defective pool, won’t issue a refund, and won’t send out a new pool. Totally horrible customer service and bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Gennipher

customer_reviews.title: Video of leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed that the pool upon filling realized the next morning when my kids wanted to get in that it had leaked and found numerous leaks at the seams that will require patching to hold the water in the pool. Other than that it was very easy set up once you have the proper place to put it allowing for a padded bottom and level surface.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Compliments to the pool designer.
customer_reviews.text: The pool definitely was easy to set up. However, I actually received more items than I needed to get the pool up and ready for use. The instructions were some what confusing at first. It would have been nice if the filter pump had been included. The installation instructions seem to be incomplete. All other instructions were clear, especially the safety instructions. The pool design was the coolest compared to the other pools offered. In any case, my Grandkids had a great time. I got the pool installed just in time for the heat.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Eugene Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase for summer
customer_reviews.text: We've had ours 2 months. No issues, kids love it. We bought a cover too for $39 which is super helpful. Its a pain to drain but that comes with the territory. Takes about 2 hours to fill from empty. Make sure ground is level. Good product but i hate they are price gouging. Why from $100 to 179 to 200 to 265. Don't be greedy and capitalize in the pandemic. Not cool. I get supply and demand, but not gouging.
customer_reviews.author: Allimull

customer_reviews.title: No pump👍 Perfect size fpr kid splashing, & adult sitting!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted one without a pump, so we could buy a 1000gph instead. So this is just what we wanted! Still came with al the hoses, etc. We got 2 small leaks in the ring within a month (our fault, I think a stick fell on it), but used the patch kit & it held solid. I would recommend having a better patch kit on-hand for emergency bc the patch was "just ok" it needs to be reinforced if we intend to keep it...we'll see how it continues to hold up. But we love it! Great size for both kids & adults (perfect height for us to sit in & have a couple drinks!)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Anne

customer_reviews.title: This a great, economical pool! Perfect size for relaxing in.
customer_reviews.text: I love my pool. It's actually a lot bigger inside than it looks on the outside. You can easily fit about 6 people in there, sitting & 2 grown adults can float without a problem. I definitely need to get the filter for the upcoming summer. It is a two person job to get it set up & inflated/ deflated. Had a hard time getting all the water out by myself, cuz it's heavy to maneuver but it is sturdy, took our southwest monsoons very well this past summer & I look forward to years of cooling off in it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great summer fun
customer_reviews.text: Now that summer is over and I finally drained this - I'll give my review. It's a great pool for the money. Kids loved to run and do flips as well as create the whirlpool of death. Get the chlorine tablets and dispenser as well as a hand held screen to filter all the big stuff (mostly grass clippings). I bought the filter but just cleaning with the screen was faster and easier. Lasted all summer and I'm sure will be a hit next year too.....
customer_reviews.author: Daniel C. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five leaks upon filling and other issues
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this product was listed at TRIPLE it's standard price of $90 when purchased at Wal-mart, etc. Second of all, we filled it yesterday, and today there are FIVE leaks sprouting from the sides of the pool. Third, the seller did not indicate that this pool came without a filter pump, so that had to be purchased separately, at an additional $90. I literally could not be more displeased with the quality of this product that we were so very excited about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Summer purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical of how this would work- but this pool has been a God-send. It's sturdy, big enough so 4 kids can "play". We did end up purchasing a 48" pool ladder so my 6 yr old can more easily get in and out- and that only added to the fun since now they can sit directly on tubes and float without getting in the "cold" water. So glad we purchased and very happy with this backyard pool. Yay summer! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaked after 3 months...
customer_reviews.text: It leaked after 3 months. It has a bunch of edges instead of being round shaped, so there are all these places where the vinyl has to crease. I guess it’s just poor design for a pool. Amazon was great, they still gave me a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Litter

customer_reviews.title: Great pool
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about purchasing this pool, but after reading all the reviews I really got excited. We got it before the established delivery day, which is was nice! This pool doesn’t come with a cover or pumps or anything. I had to purchased everything else departed. It’s a nice pool my kids love it. It took about 3-4 hours to fill up. Very easy set up. Unfortunately, I did find the Same pool About 30 dlls cheaper at one of the city’ stores.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine Summer Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Quarantine GAME Changer! After months in the house and no access to our local YMCA pool, this pool saved the day. Very easy to set up and my son is in love! Make sure to get the Intex pool filter system, pool shock, chlorine tablets and float and the Pool cover. We even got the Intex cleaning kit with I think is optional. Overall it’s a bit of an investment for all of these items but definitely worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: afinishedwork

customer_reviews.title: 2020 essential
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pool back in Spring 2020 when the pandemic really popped off, and so glad i did! It provided a great little oasis in our backyard. Laid down sand to level, and set up the pool on a tarp. It was super easy to set up and fill up. A decent pump is absolutely necessary for this pool, i just got an Intex one and it connected seamlessly. The weather is cooler now so I'm in the process of draining it and storing it away, and that's also been fairly easy.
customer_reviews.author: K. N.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away! Used two times before it became useless
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed that we were only able to use this pool 2 times. The upper air chamber has a leak around the air inlet and we have been unable to successfully patch it because its where 3 layers come together. Intex customer service number goes to a message that says they are too busy to answer and to try again later. I have tried to call 4 times throughout the day. I would strongly advise saying away from this model due to the cost vs risk. If intex were to have made this right I would have provided a very different review as I think this may be an edge case due to the locationof our leak.
customer_reviews.author: Dilly

customer_reviews.title: Install Tips
customer_reviews.text: Tougher to set up then it says, 2-3 hours if you are installing the pump. Very important to pull the wrinkles out of the bottom as it fills. Make sure to do this while only a few inches of water. Pull toward the sides working your way around the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but enough
customer_reviews.text: We had some 100 degree days up her in Maine and this made them no big deal. After long cold winters I never handle the heat of summer well. Until we got this thing. Whenever I would get hot I would just run out and jump into this and I was good for another couple hours. Big enough that my husband and I and our 2 kids could be in it comfortably. Its deep enough that when an adult sits down the water comes up to your neck. It's like a cold hot tub. Cant really swim in it. Good for just sitting and cooling off
customer_reviews.author: KRocque

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: 2nd intex pool. both leaked. This one in the bottom somehere. Have it set up in garage, so it isn't unlevel or have rocks under it. Just put it up, brand new,, filled the pool, and it's leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing. Buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed. The product was defective. The top part deflated after the 3rd day. There was no visible hole. I asked for a refund to return it and received a week to be able to return the product. Usually companies give you 30 days to be able to return this product and I completely forgot to check the date, so that is my bad. Now I’m more upset because I can’t return this product. If it would have been in perfect condition, I wouldn’t have even considered returning the product because I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: MistaE

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced quality product
customer_reviews.text: I would have gone 3 stars for quality, as it is quite rugged, but the value for $$ let me down. I found a pool with the exact same specs locally WITH a working pump for $65. A little bummed on the overall deal, but grateful to have an [overpriced] pool for the season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT waste your money!!!!Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: As we were filling the pool ring with air the stop valve broke. Hopefully the pool lasts longer than that. UPDATE: we only got to use this 4 times. the air ring did not stay inflated. So pool constantly drains as the air ring deflates. This was WORST purchase EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup & my kids LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: I was able to setup this pool by myself pretty easily, including the filter/pump which I bought separately. Ideally you would install this on a concrete patio with a heavy duty tarp underneath. My kids absolutely love this thing and have been playing in it almost every day for the past 2 weeks since it has been warm outside. I really like how easy it is to setup and fill. The quality seems very good and we plan to use this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ground
customer_reviews.text: You better be sure that the ground you put this pool on is PERFECTLY LEVEL!!! The slightest unleavened ground will mess this pool up. BEWARE
customer_reviews.author: Tom Garrett

customer_reviews.title: True review
customer_reviews.text: Amazing customer service. It was a perfect size. Me my mom and my daughter fit perfect with room to spare. Unfortunately it had a small leake. Couldn't find it. I thought I was stuck like chuck and this was my daughter bday gift. But the company sent me new one after a return which they made easy. I would have given it 4 stars if it didn't have small leak.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Saved us from hot August days
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised by how much we enjoyed our pool so far. Its a good size, not too small ,not too big, you can still swim in it as an adult( in circles of course) and my 7 year old loves it. Its very sturdy and the lining it thick. The top ring had to be inflated more, the day after set up, as the sun seemed to soften it a bit. We filled it with more air and it has stayed firm. Next summer, I plan to go a size up, by this was perfect thos year, as we rent and share a yard and did not want anything too obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Perrotta

customer_reviews.title: Seller, KRA, won’t replace if it’s damaged.
customer_reviews.text: We set this up the first time and it had pin whole in the inflatable part and two on the body. First set up and we had to patch it and it still doesn’t stay aired up. I contacted the seller in the time frame and they refused to refund us or send a replacement. We’ve purchased before and liked it. We are mostly disappointed that it was a product malfunction and yet no replacement. $100 and still no pool for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Leaky new pool defective and no warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Good product BUT.....Customer service is as bad as I’ve ever dealt with. Received our 10’ pool on April 25 when it was still too cold outside to setup. Waited til the 2nd week in June to set up. This is our second Easy Set pool. The 8’ lasted 2 seasons. Filled up the pool and noticed that it didn’t stay full enough for the ring to lift up all the way. Turns out the seam between the inflatable ring and the top of the pool is leaking. Contacted customer service and was told there’s no exchanges or refunds after 30 days EVEN THOUGH THE PRODUCT IS DEFECTIVE!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Thin material
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone else during COVID, we bought a pool for the kids. This one seemed to fit the bill. It’s a good size for young ones and adults both. The only downside is the material is not particularly strong. We have had several pinhole leaks develop on the sides, and now a tear in the bottom. The weight of it creates a decent seal, but it leaks slowly to where I have to put 6 inches of water in every 3 days to maintain full. Be very careful where you place it or you’ll have similar issues.
customer_reviews.author: J. Adamski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Easy to set up although I haven't been able to figure out how to attach the filter. Also, get an electric bump for this. Don't buy the recommended manual Intex pump. You would pass out pumping after three attempts.
customer_reviews.author: AzulTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be more disappointed. Advertised as having a pump and didn’t. Will never fill to anything other than a wading pool meant for toddlers. The jacked the price up as this is usually a $60 pool. You can never get it level unless you have a perfectly flat ground which where I put it; it does. Even if you buy a pump, the sides will never inflate enough to use it. Save your money. I wish I could get mine back.
customer_reviews.author: The Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Deflates and spills.
customer_reviews.text: The first day it was awesome, filled it up and had fun for a couple hours. The next day it was all deflated and spilled all the water(yes it is on a flat surface). I figured I did a mistake and did it all over again, well after an hour it started to deflate. It got super annoying, I had to inflate it ever 45min-1hour. The picture is of overnight. Now I'm stuck with a pool that doesn't work because I have to pay shipping to return it 😒
customer_reviews.author: Maria Deanda

customer_reviews.title: Bottom side blew out
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of this pool blew out as shown in the pictures. Didn't even last 2 months, in fact we missed the return window by 9 days so I'm super frustrated. While it lasted it was great, we loved it, perfect for my 6 yr old twins. We chose this one over the Summer Waves brand and I'm kinda bummed now. My kids are super disappointed as am I. I don't know if this was a flaw in the pool or what, but there's no way it should've happened.
customer_reviews.author: tami

customer_reviews.title: Not very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have shopped around more. The product wasn't worth the price. The box came damaged. The pool isn't very sturdy. The blow up part slumps a bit. So when you fill the pool up it slouches. Definitely more for kids than adults.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Turner

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: If the ground is at the slightest bit of an incline this pool will gradually roll down hill and let out all of the water... didn’t even last a weekend and that’s all I wanted it for. Huge disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for 3 months and if you won’t buy a better pump don’t spend the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this pool for 3 months and if you won’t buy a better pump don’t spend the money. The water stays clear but an algae builds up on the bottom bc the pump doesn’t circulate well
customer_reviews.author: Bethanie

customer_reviews.title: 10FT POOL
customer_reviews.text: EVERY SEAM ON IT LEAKS. The seams where it attached to the blue ring top all leak. I don't know how to fix everyone one of these leaks!! Poor quality. I was hoping the company would see this and send another. Everyone thing on this pool leaks. The top air ring won't stay aired up. Every seam vertically and horizontally leaks. This was a total disaster of a pool.
customer_reviews.author: J. Handlin

customer_reviews.title: Great pool!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I ordered from Amazon and never got my package so I bought the same one at Target without having to wait. It is great for the price. Some reviews are ridiculous, we have to give things care as well.. make sure you place something at the bottom of the pool prior to filling it, whether it’s grass or cement. Watch your kids for misuse. Things are not meant to last forever. My kids love it
customer_reviews.author: Yahaira Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 32 days
customer_reviews.text: This was our second intex pool. The first one(8foot) lasted 2 years! This one lasted 32 days. The air ring will not hold air. I have spent today looking for a hole and I can't find one.
customer_reviews.author: macey_may

customer_reviews.title: Great size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This pool was totally worth the money. We used it for my daughter’s birthday and it’s still kicking a month later. I read a lot of bad reviews about it but I find it rather sturdy. The kids loved it but I really like that it’s big enough for adults to hang out in on a hot day.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Eves

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item and waited almost 1 month for the arrival of it. After spending almost 2 days, I finally was able to set it up and put water in it(note that it needs LOTS of water to fill up the pool) only to realise that the pool that a hole in it and the water keeps going out. I can’t believe amazon would sell a defective item. I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Fool me once...
customer_reviews.text: Had a dime sized hole in the side, after patching the hole and filling it up I let it sit over night the patch is holding strong but there’s still a leak somewhere. Will most likely be returning; bought one last year and it leaked too.
customer_reviews.author: Bluethunder465

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: As soon as the return window closed it failed. It leaks air I cannot find we here the leak is. It is good for a couple of hours then it deflates and water runs out overboard. It doesn't last overnight. Very bad deal
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo D.

customer_reviews.title: Solid deal. Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to use at a surprise birthday party. I purchased the inflate-a-bull (blow up mechanical bull) to use with it and it was a huge success. Definitely recommend! Not sure how it would hold up for long term use, but for the price this thing is really great. Get in the pool and stretch out the bottom while it fills up to avoid an awkward shaped pool
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality, but typically only lasts one season
customer_reviews.text: Works great. But even after storing the pool in a large container in my garage over the winter, it still managed to get small holes. For the price to repair, you're better off buying a new one each season, and for the cost it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: We love this pool!!! Set up was a breeze! It’s been up for 2 month and we’ve had zero problems. I put 4 cups of bleach in it every other week, have a chlorine floater, pump, water hose vacuum and cover that I use and it stays so clean!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Cornuet

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: We love this swimming pool system! I’ve owned 3 over the last 5 years! As the family grows so does our pool size! We are so happy with the Reliability!
customer_reviews.author: Julia E. Garegnani

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Awful customer service form the seller. I got the pool and it has a hole in it. When I contact the seller, he said that there was obviously no hole and making it seem like I wanted a free pool. All I want was to return it since I can’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Started out great, then the fun leaked out
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, but don’t rush it. Smooth out the bottom. Once you fill it, it is in place for the summer! Was great for about 1.5 months and then was leaking from the bottom somewhere. The air ring was leaking and needed to be filled every day. We eventually gave up and drained it. Now I have a pump, skimmer, vacum, etc for sale....
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bedard

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but lasts only 1 season
customer_reviews.text: This pool is a lot of fun for kids, but it develops holes while stoved away for winter. We had to patch it after we set it for the second season so that it can hold water. The inflatable top doesn't hold the air for more than 2 days the second season either. Need to pump it all the time. It's worth $70 I paid for it, you just need to replace it every season. It's definitely not worth the current sticker price $300 driven by stay-at-home demand.
customer_reviews.author: Stepan

customer_reviews.title: Intex Pool Summer fun.
customer_reviews.text: Intel pool awesome buy. Best relief,fun and fabulous price. Recommend this,we live in the desert. Affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kids
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. I have two kids 6 and 2 1/2 and they love going in it, my husband had no problem setting it up just make sure it's on level ground we learned the hard way when it was uneven and most of the pool drained out. We did have a small hole in it (thanks to my dog) didn't use the patch kit that it came with just because of previous reviews on how it didn't work so we went to namco and got a better patch kit and the pool is holding up well. Suggest that you get the chlorine float and filters so that you don't get any algae build up
customer_reviews.author: Smac1007

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy against critter claws!
customer_reviews.text: After going through 2 other more expensive inflatable pools that didn't last long at all against raccoons and cats, I got this one and its doing great! I love that the bottom portion is really thick and very hard to puncture (and doesn't inflate) and that if the top ring does deflate, the pool is still usable!
customer_reviews.author: Marta Hazekamp

customer_reviews.title: Does not include pump
customer_reviews.text: I like the pool, it is a perfect size for my 4 year old and 1 year old but if you have children 5 and up I would go with a bigger size, the ground needs to be totally leveled before placing water into or you will have a pool with water on one side and none on the other, I enjoyed it and I'm 31 years old it was refreshing. But do not forget to buy a pump
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Deep but not too deep for kids .
customer_reviews.text: It is a great pool perfect for kids 10 and under. Love how the filter keeps things clean.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great size for grandkids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pool for our grandchildren to enjoy when they visit it is not deep but plenty wide it 10 feet we put it on our covered patio which kept it level. Last year we had an 18 foot Intel pool And we could never get it level in the yard it was a pain so we went smaller and put it on the concrete and it works great that way and it’s out of the direct sun most of the day better for tender young skin.
customer_reviews.author: Dagwood&Blondie

customer_reviews.title: slanted pool that is not 30 inches high
customer_reviews.text: The pool is fine but we had to fill it three times because our ground was not level. We tried to clean the outside but now the dirt is stuck to it. The 30 inch description of the height is highly innacuarate, try 12 feet high on a good day. We have leveled the pool and it still sways to one side!! My daughter loves it which is all that matters but I would never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Vollmer

customer_reviews.title: Love These Little Pools!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned several sizes of these Intex pools and I think they're great. Easy to set up and maintain. If you have little ones or just want to cool off, and your yard doesn't have lots of space or doesn't get a lot of sun, these pools are a great and inexpensive solution.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Fennimore

customer_reviews.title: Product defect
customer_reviews.text: Product defect-Just opened the pool yesterday as it was the first nice day to actually use it. Pumped it up and filled it and the kids just loved it. They were excited to get into the pool again early today and the top of the pool in the area that you inflate is now enlarged. Not sure if it is going to pop or split open. Is there something we or you can do to salvage the pool this early in the season? Please advise. Laurie Gyscek tgys@aol.com
customer_reviews.author: laurie gyscek

customer_reviews.title: Great Relaxing Pool
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this pool. I am in this pool nearly every day. It's bery nice to be able to sit and relax in after a long day. I have bought a floater & laid in the pool for hours. I have had this pool for almost 2 months now & it is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The air ring wouldn't stay inflated so I had to inflate it twice daily to prevent water from spilling out. It rained some last night and now the pool is dead. It lasted from mid May until today, July 1. Not great durability but worth the price for a little lounging in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: Lila Grace

customer_reviews.title: Skip this pool.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this product. It will not hold water. Have filled it up twice. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy This!
customer_reviews.text: I got to use this product only once and it just doesn't stay inflated. It's terrible. I bought a cover and everything for it. Put it on cement, went above and beyond to ensure a perfect set-up. I reached out to amazon asking for a replacement am just outside the 30 day window so they said to reach out to Intex. Intex only warrantys this for 30 days, not a year like most companies. That says a lot about their product. If you're not willing to have a basic year warranty on your product, it's probably bad. Do not buy this! You will be out the $200+ and may never get to even enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicky

customer_reviews.title: Better than the framed pools.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a flat surface, these are the way to go. I hated taking down our framed pool at the end of every season. The poles would get stuck inside the pockets. So a couple years ago I cut the poles out and threw it away. My daughter wanted another pool and found these online. I gave it a shot, and it was worth it. Setup and removal are much easier. Plus it fits inside a large Tupperware container at the end of the season 👍
customer_reviews.author: AJ Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Spent 5-6 hours to fill up the pool, and after my kids used the pool 3 times the rim got a hole. The kids were playing the usual pool games, there were no sharp objects in or near the pool. I made sure there were no rocks under the pool either. My kids are 6 and 4 so they don’t have super strength to pop the rim of the pool. The fun was over quick and I wasted much $$$ on the water bill for a 3x use.
customer_reviews.author: Luby

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Nothing fancy, but just right for us!
customer_reviews.text: We love this little pool! Granted it’s only been full for about an hour, the kids have already decided it’s the best. We needed something a little bigger than the kiddie pools, but not ready to make the leap to a “real” above ground pool, this fits the bill perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie S

customer_reviews.title: I loved having this little pool during the Summer.
customer_reviews.text: We really enjoyed having this little pool to cool off in this Summer. Great for small yard and extremely easy to care for. I also bought the floating bleach tab dispenser, ran the pump a couple hours a day, and had zero problems.
customer_reviews.author: TroyKat

customer_reviews.title: It may be that I got sent the lemon and ...
customer_reviews.text: It may be that I got sent the lemon and no one else has this problem, but I cannot keep the rim inflated and I haven't located the source of the leak yet. because the rim won't stay firm (it deflates every 24hrs) the Intex cover I bought for it is more or less worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha M. Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Blown up part had hole after one use.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one last summer and it lasted the whole summer and made a great value. This summer I needed another so ordered the same one...it already has a hole somewhere in top blown up part after one use. Now I need to try to find it to patch it and limp through summer.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Buy elsewhere!
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself $ and buy at Academy for a fraction of the price....esp since you have to buy the ground cover, pump & cover separately..
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with filter....
customer_reviews.text: Product did not come with filter container even though it was shown in small brown box inside with instructions information. Was somewhat disappointed since I only get to use the black plastic tab to cover the hole which was suppose to be for the filter line. I tried checking to see if it should come with the filter container. Mt little boys was so excited to swim in them that I did not want to return them and ruin their excitement so I kept them but really wanted yo return them.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Phai

customer_reviews.title: Setup the pool and it was fine for a couple of weeks, then started leaking all over!
customer_reviews.text: Setup the pool and it was fine for a couple of weeks, then started leaking all over! I can't see where it's leaking, so I can't tell where a patch is needed. Now I'm stuck with a huge chunk of useless plastic and it's too late to return it :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cool pool
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with our Intex Easy Set 6 foot pool. When it is hot we can sit in it and cool off. It was easy to set up. We used a nebulizer to inflate the top ring, and it took about an hour to fill up with water. The water stays very cool and it is a blessing on these hot days. It was inexpensive and we'll worth the money. Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Julie.L.Pew

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup. Would recommend. Keeping the ring inflated I would say is the worst part but not horrible. Getting the ground level very important. Very enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Lasted EIGHT Days!
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it--for eight days. The pool sprung a mysterious leak overnight and I couldn't keep up with filling it with air, couldn't find the leak. Very disgusted, especially considering that the seller had jacked up (doubled) the price on this piece of junk! INTEX POOLS ARE JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great pool for the money, not really big enough for adults unless you just want to sit in it.
customer_reviews.text: Great small pool for kids. Was not aware, however, that it is outfitted to have a filter pump hooked up to it. Should be included in the description so people know to buy the filter pump as well when they order the pool! Bought the cover to go with it, and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top ring delfated overnight, waste of money and effort
customer_reviews.text: We got about 4 hours of use out of this pool after working to set it up all day... wake up this morning to it only halfway full and the top ring is delfated. So disappointed after taking all of the time to set it up and buying all of the necessary accessories. Our kids are going to be so upset when they find out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Major

customer_reviews.title: We Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! We finally bought our second pool same size we had the previous for about 5 years so it was def time , during these pandemic times we did our part and stayed home the kids have used this pool almost every weekend and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Bay area family

customer_reviews.title: May not last one season but fun while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you get the ground very level. It was a fun way to cool off on hot days and our grandchildren loved it but it probably will only last a few months. Ours lasted about 5 months and then the top ring split. Consider it a one season, disposable, pool and hope it makes it through the warm weather season.
customer_reviews.author: belfaster

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, only the pool, no pump, also I don't think it's a real intex pool!
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: BEST BUY OF THE YEAR!
customer_reviews.text: Best pool for the money, hands down!! Super easy to install and big enough for 5 kids I had in it all summer plus more. VERY durable. I have a wolf dog and a 150 pound Alaskan Malamute and never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Not huge but big enough to chill nicely after a hot day. Enjoyable with a beer, cigar or joint
customer_reviews.author: spiderman

customer_reviews.title: Great little pool for its price
customer_reviews.text: Great little pool for its price. Good for one child and one adult to play comfortably in it no filter with it so you don't have to deal with all of that I would strongly recommend it for a wading pool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased same in years ago. Easy setup, I'm 72 set up within an hour. Only problem is in Miami fl & heat sun ruins the ring within a year. Purchased netting to keep leaves & dragon flys out.
customer_reviews.author: NANCY

customer_reviews.title: Good pool to soak for the price.
customer_reviews.text: It works as well as I expected, which is to say it works pretty good. We have nothing but dirt in our backyard, so a base was an issue, but a layer of boxes and tarps worked satisfactorily. Ultimately we got good use out of it, setting it up and draining it several times and if you get it on sale it's somewhat disposable. It fits 2-3 adults well enough to move around a bit. Wish there was a little deeper one, but it's still good if you have no other options.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Walker

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh...
customer_reviews.text: The top part inflated but the edges do not. The pool rises as it fills up with water and mine didn’t fill up evenly and once it started to fill up, it was too heavy to adjust. I don’t know if it reached its full potential in height. I won’t be getting this kind again. Did not come with filter, water was stagnant within a week. Frogs laid thousands of tad poles in mine so now I’m having to keep it just for a back yard aquarium. I can’t wait to trash it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael B

customer_reviews.title: Did not keep it's form
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately upon set up the pool did not keep it's for resulting in it being unable to be fully filled with water. Air ring at top did not have durability to keep the shape of the pool. Full refund for return so not upset. I have seen pictures where it succeeded, however will not be reattempting.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Two leaks found
customer_reviews.text: Pool came with two leaks which were discovered upon filing Have to return ; shouldn’t have to patch a brand new pool in two places . Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Great pool on level ground.
customer_reviews.text: Pool has been great. One minor tear in the material, but I’m partially to blame, just need to be careful around concrete. Make sure the ground is level, if more than an inch or so of slope is involved your pool will be tilted. I wish the fittings were US fittings not metric for the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Dotson

product_meta.title: Intex 6ft x 20in Easy Set Swimming Pool #28101
product_meta.description: Size:6 feet x 20 inchAre your children ready for their first 'big' pool? The Intex Easy Set pool is extremley easy for parents to sit up and just the right size for younger children to injoy their first 'big person' pool . Care - All filter pump units must be placed 2 metres away from the pool. We recommend that filtration is turned off when the pool is in operation. We recommend a smooth concrete slab as a suitable base- contact a reputable local builder for advice on local soil conditions. Failure to set up the pool on a flat, level compact ground could result in the pool's collapse or the possibility that a person lounging in the pool could be swept out. Do not lean, straddle or exert pressure on the inflatable top ring or top rim as injury or flooding could occur. Do not sit on, climb or straddle the sides of the pool.
feature_bullets: The Easy Set Pool is the perfect and convenient product to have fun on the bright sunny days.
The Easy Set Pool is the perfect starter pool. Quick and super-easy to set-up and the right size for your younger kids.
The Easy Set Pool Water capacity: 886 Litres
Easy Set Pool dimensions: 183 cm x 51 cm
The Easy Set Pool builds itself as it fills and comes with a drain plug for easy emptying for customer convenience.
The Easy Set Pool is a robust and strong alternative, because the sidewalls are made with 3 separate layers of material for extra strength and durability.
The Easy Set Pool is suitable for ages +3

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars5,580 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
